title: React JS Full Course 2023 | Build an App and Master React in 1 Hour
description: Master React in this comprehensive course! We'll build a modern application while covering core concepts like hooks, state management, routing, and best practices.

comments.text: This course helped me land my first dev job!

title: Next.js 13 Crash Course | App Router, React Server Components & More
description: Learn the newest features in Next.js 13 including the revolutionary App Router, React Server Components, and improved data fetching methods.

comments.text: Brad's tutorials are always top notch!

title: TypeScript Tutorial for Beginners | Crash Course
description: Learn TypeScript from scratch! This comprehensive tutorial covers types, interfaces, generics, and everything you need to know to get started with TypeScript.

comments.text: Mosh explains complex concepts so well!
Finally making the switch to TypeScript!

title: Tailwind CSS Full Course 2023 | Build and Deploy a Modern Website
description: Master Tailwind CSS by building a stunning modern website. Learn utility classes, responsive design, dark mode, and advanced animations.

comments.text: Never going back to regular CSS!

title: MERN Stack Tutorial | Build a Social Media App
description: Build a full-stack social media application using MongoDB, Express, React, and Node.js. Includes authentication, real-time updates, and image uploads.

comments.text: Best MERN stack tutorial out there!

title: Docker Crash Course for Beginners
description: Learn Docker fundamentals in this practical course. Covers containers, images, Docker Compose, and deployment best practices.

title: Build a Stunning Portfolio Website | React + Three.js
description: Create an impressive 3D portfolio website using React and Three.js. Learn about 3D animations, effects, and responsive design.

comments.text: This took my portfolio to the next level!

title: Redux Toolkit Tutorial | Modern State Management
description: Master modern state management with Redux Toolkit. Learn about slices, thunks, RTK Query, and best practices for large applications.

comments.text: RTK Query is a game changer.
